claim: Within the Coldsnap set, Sunscour has the greatest converted mana cost among all cards.
extra_info: card set Coldsnap refers to name = 'Coldsnap'
reasoning: Sunscour has a converted mana cost of 7.0 in the Coldsnap set, but it is not uniquely the greatest. Multiple other cards (Commandeer, Jokulmorder, Rimefeather Owl, Herald of Leshrac, Soul Spike, Tresserhorn Skyknight, Fury of the Horde, Rimescale Dragon, Allosaurus Rider) also share the same converted mana cost of 7.0. The claim implies Sunscour alone has the greatest CMC, which is contradicted by the data.

content.text: I'll verify this claim step by step. Let me start by exploring the database schema.

content.content:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "sets"
(
    id               INTEGER           not null
        primary key autoincrement,
    baseSetSize      INTEGER,
    block            TEXT,
    booster          TEXT,
    code             TEXT              not null
        unique,
    isFoilOnly       INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isForeignOnly    INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isNonFoilOnly    INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isOnlineOnly     INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isPartialPreview INTEGER default 0 not null,
    keyruneCode      TEXT,
    mcmId            INTEGER,
    mcmIdExtras      INTEGER,
    mcmName          TEXT,
    mtgoCode         TEXT,
    name             TEXT,
    parentCode       TEXT,
    releaseDate      DATE,
    tcgplayerGroupId INTEGER,
    totalSetSize     INTEGER,
    type             TEXT
);

content.text: Now let me query for the Coldsnap set and find the card with the greatest converted mana cost.

input.command: sqlite3 "/Users/david/workspace/claimdb/test_dbs/card_games.sqlite" "SELECT c.name, c.convertedManaCost FROM cards c JOIN sets s ON c.setCode = s.code WHERE s.name = 'Coldsnap' ORDER BY c.convertedManaCost DESC LIMIT 10;"
input.description: Find cards with highest converted mana cost in Coldsnap

content.content:

content.text: Interesting — there are multiple cards tied at a converted mana cost of 7.0. Let me check if any card has a higher CMC:

input.command: sqlite3 "/Users/david/workspace/claimdb/test_dbs/card_games.sqlite" "SELECT c.name, c.convertedManaCost FROM cards c JOIN sets s ON c.setCode = s.code WHERE s.name = 'Coldsnap' AND c.convertedManaCost > 7.0 ORDER BY c.convertedManaCost DESC;"
input.description: Check if any Coldsnap card has CMC greater than 7

content.text:
No cards have a CMC greater than 7.0. So Sunscour is tied with several other cards at a CMC of 7.0 — it does **not** uniquely have the "greatest" converted mana cost. The claim says Sunscour has "the greatest converted mana cost among all cards" in Coldsnap, implying it is the sole leader. In reality, there are multiple cards sharing that maximum value of 7.0.
